Quote.Author: Geoffrey Canada
Quote.QuoteValue: Video games offer violent messages, and even the sports video games include taunting and teasing

Quote.Author: Geoffrey Canada
Quote.QuoteValue: Middle-class families know education begins at birth

Quote.Author: Geoffrey Canada
Quote.QuoteValue: There's not a day that goes by that I don't draw on my undergraduate background in psychology

Quote.Author: Geoffrey Canada
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are a lousy teacher, you should be fired

Quote.Author: Geoffrey Canada
Quote.QuoteValue: It is important to have permanent safe spaces in Harlem

Quote.Author: Geoffrey Canada
Quote.QuoteValue: Lots of boys pick strong messages about who they are and who they want to be from the media

Quote.Author: Geoffrey Canada
Quote.QuoteValue: Movies portray men as tough guys

Quote.Author: Geoffrey Chaucer
Quote.QuoteValue: Time and tide wait for no man

Quote.Author: Geoffrey Chaucer
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest scholars are not usually the wisest people

Quote.Author: Geoffrey Chaucer
Quote.QuoteValue: And she was fair as is the rose in May

Quote.Author: Geoffrey Chaucer
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is blind

Quote.Author: Geoffrey Chaucer
Quote.QuoteValue: People can die of mere imagination

Quote.Author: Geoffrey Chaucer
Quote.QuoteValue: There's never a new fashion but it's old

Quote.Author: Geoffrey Chaucer
Quote.QuoteValue: Nowhere so busy a man as he than he, and yet he seemed busier than he was

Quote.Author: Geoffrey Chaucer
Quote.QuoteValue: He was as fresh as is the month of May

Quote.Author: Geoffrey Chaucer
Quote.QuoteValue: By nature, men love newfangledness

Quote.Author: Geoffrey Chaucer
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no workman, whatsoever he be, That may both work well and hastily

Quote.Author: Georg C. Lichtenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Doubt must be no more than vigilance, otherwise it can become dangerous

Quote.Author: Georg C. Lichtenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Man loves company - even if it is only that of a small burning candle

Quote.Author: Georg C. Lichtenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Men still have to be governed by deception

Quote.Author: Georg C. Lichtenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: We have no words for speaking of wisdom to the stupid. He who understands the wise is wise already

Quote.Author: Georg C. Lichtenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing is more conducive to peace of mind than not having any opinion at all

Quote.Author: Georg C. Lichtenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Perhaps in time the so-called Dark Ages will be thought of as including our own

Quote.Author: Georg C. Lichtenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Never undertake anything for which you wouldn't have the courage to ask the blessings of heaven

Quote.Author: Georg C. Lichtenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: A person reveals his character by nothing so clearly as the joke he resents

Quote.Author: Georg C. Lichtenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: One must judge men not by their opinions, but by what their opinions have made of them

Quote.Author: Georg C. Lichtenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: The fly that doesn't want to be swatted is most secure when it lights on the fly-swatter

Quote.Author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing great in the world has ever been accomplished without passion

Quote.Author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel
Quote.QuoteValue: Mere goodness can achieve little against the power of nature

Quote.Author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel
Quote.QuoteValue: The learner always begins by finding fault, but the scholar sees the positive merit in everything

Quote.Author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel
Quote.QuoteValue: Truth in philosophy means that concept and external reality correspond

Quote.Author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel
Quote.QuoteValue: Governments have never learned anything from history, or acted on principles deducted from it

Quote.Author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel
Quote.QuoteValue: The history of the world is none other than the progress of the consciousness of freedom

Quote.Author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel
Quote.QuoteValue: All that is real is reasonable, and all that is reasonable is real

Quote.Author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not ugly, but my beauty is a total creation

Quote.Author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel
Quote.QuoteValue: Too fair to worship, too divine to love

Quote.Author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel
Quote.QuoteValue: World history is a court of judgment

Quote.Author: George A. Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: A man travels the world over in search of what he needs and returns home to find it

Quote.Author: George A. Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: Reality can destroy the dream; why shouldn't the dream destroy reality?

Quote.Author: George A. Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: The wrong way always seems the more reasonable

Quote.Author: George A. Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: The difficulty in life is the choice

Quote.Author: George A. Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: Taking something from one man and making it worse is plagiarism

Quote.Author: George A. Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: Remorse: beholding heaven and feeling hell

Quote.Author: George A. Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: A man of letters never objects to a slum. He sharpens his pen there

Quote.Author: George A. Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: England produced Shakespeare, and the British Empire the six-shilling novel

Quote.Author: George A. Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: An idea is so impersonal; it is yours today and the whole world's tomorrow

Quote.Author: George A. Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: Art must be parochial in the beginning to be cosmopolitan in the end

Quote.Author: George A. Romero
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't really make fun of zombies. They're not liars. They're not cheats

Quote.Author: George A. Romero
Quote.QuoteValue: I always thought of the zombies as being about revolution, one generation consuming the next

Quote.Author: George A. Romero
Quote.QuoteValue: I expect a zombie to show up on 'Sesame Street' soon, teaching kids to count

Quote.Author: George A. Romero
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm like my zombies. I won't stay dead!

Quote.Author: George A. Romero
Quote.QuoteValue: I like guys who are understandable and good guys who are flawed

Quote.Author: George A. Romero
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll never get sick of zombies. I just get sick of producers

Quote.Author: George A. Romero
Quote.QuoteValue: I keep a little notebook of things that I can do to the zombies that might be silly and fun

Quote.Author: George A. Romero
Quote.QuoteValue: Ever since 'Lassie' and 'Old Yeller', I won't watch animal movies. Animals in movies always die

Quote.Author: George A. Romero
Quote.QuoteValue: The most realistic blood I've seen is when Marlon Brando gets beat up in On The Waterfront

Quote.Author: George A. Romero
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing's ever real until it's real

Quote.Author: George Allen, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Work hard, stay positive, and get up early. It's the best part of the day

Quote.Author: George Allen, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Forget the past - the future will give you plenty to worry about

Quote.Author: George Allen, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: The tougher the job, the greater the reward

Quote.Author: George Allen, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Persevere and get it done

Quote.Author: George Allen, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Every day you waste is one you can never make up

Quote.Author: George Allen, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Winning is the science of being totally prepared

Quote.Author: George Allen, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to catch more fish, use more hooks

Quote.Author: George Allen, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: The achiever is the only individual who is truly alive

Quote.Author: George Allen, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Leisure time is that five or six hours when you sleep at night

Quote.Author: George Allen, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Every time you win, you're reborn; when you lose, you die a little

Quote.Author: George Best
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe 'loner' is too strong a word, but I've always enjoyed being on my own

Quote.Author: George Best
Quote.QuoteValue: I was ill, and everyone could see it but me

Quote.Author: George Best
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to go missing a lot... Miss Canada, Miss United Kingdom, Miss World

Quote.Author: George Best
Quote.QuoteValue: I spent a lot of money on booze, birds and fast cars. The rest I just squandered

Quote.Author: George Best
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is about mutual respect, apart from attraction

Quote.Author: George Best
Quote.QuoteValue: I've stopped drinking, but only while I'm asleep

Quote.Author: George Best
Quote.QuoteValue: That thing about being an icon, the fifth Beatle, I just found it so freaky

Quote.Author: George Best
Quote.QuoteValue: Football is a sad game

Quote.Author: George Best
Quote.QuoteValue: I always wanted more - more of everything

Quote.Author: George Best
Quote.QuoteValue: If you make up your own mind, you can only blame yourself

Quote.Author: George Burns
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city

Quote.Author: George Burns
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't help getting older, but you don't have to get old

Quote.Author: George Burns
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather be a failure at something I love than a success at something I hate

Quote.Author: George Burns
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm at the age now where just putting my cigar in its holder is a thrill

Quote.Author: George Burns
Quote.QuoteValue: If you live to be one hundred, you've got it made. Very few people die past that age

Quote.Author: George Burns
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't stay in bed, unless you can make money in bed

Quote.Author: George Burns
Quote.QuoteValue: Acting is all about honesty. If you can fake that, you've got it made

Quote.Author: George Burns
Quote.QuoteValue: Retirement at sixty-five is ridiculous. When I was sixty-five I still had pimples

Quote.Author: George Burns
Quote.QuoteValue: The most important thing in acting is honesty. If you can fake that, you've got it made

Quote.Author: George Burns
Quote.QuoteValue: I spent a year in that town, one Sunday

Quote.Author: George Clooney
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoy going on motorcycle trips and stopping in small towns and enjoying drinks with the locals

Quote.Author: George Clooney
Quote.QuoteValue: You have only a short period of time in your life to make your mark, and I'm there now

Quote.Author: George Clooney
Quote.QuoteValue: The only failure is not to try

Quote.Author: George Clooney
Quote.QuoteValue: We're picking on people we can beat

Quote.Author: George Clooney
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not smart enough and I don't know enough about what's going on

Quote.Author: George Clooney
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no connection between al-Qaeda and Iraq

Quote.Author: George Clooney
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like to share my personal life... it wouldn't be personal if I shared it

Quote.Author: George Clooney
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really white trash

Quote.Author: George Clooney
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the flavor of the month

Quote.Author: George Clooney
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a Method actor. I spent years training for the drinking and carousing I had to do in this film

Quote.Author: George Foreman
Quote.QuoteValue: I know from experience that you should never give up on yourself or others, no matter what

Quote.Author: George Foreman
Quote.QuoteValue: Sure the fight was fixed. I fixed it with a right hand

Quote.Author: George Foreman
Quote.QuoteValue: I look at my children and one thing I'm most proud of, in my heart, are my children

Quote.Author: George Foreman
Quote.QuoteValue: You may have even an ex-wife or an ex-husband, but you can never have ex-children

Quote.Author: George Foreman
Quote.QuoteValue: Boxing is like jazz. The better it is, the less people appreciate it

Quote.Author: George Foreman
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother was watching on television and she doesn't want me to hurt anyone

Quote.Author: George Foreman
Quote.QuoteValue: The question isn't at what age I want to retire, it's at what income

Quote.Author: George Foreman
Quote.QuoteValue: My kids idea of a hard life is to live in a house with only one phone

Quote.Author: George Foreman
Quote.QuoteValue: Put your name on something, it better be the best... you only get one shot

Quote.Author: George Foreman
Quote.QuoteValue: The referee is going to be the most important person in the ring tonight besides the fighters

Quote.Author: George H. W. Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: Read my lips: no new taxes

Quote.Author: George H. W. Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: Old guys can still do fun things

Quote.Author: George H. W. Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: I like a colorful sock. I'm a sock man

Quote.Author: George H. W. Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: I have opinions of my own, strong opinions, but I don't always agree with them

Quote.Author: George H. W. Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: It's no exaggeration to say that the undecideds could go one way or another

Quote.Author: George H. W. Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not one who - who flamboyantly believes in throwing a lot of words around

Quote.Author: George H. W. Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: We are not the sum of our possessions

Quote.Author: George H. W. Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm conservative, but I'm not a nut about it

Quote.Author: George H. W. Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I'd be a better president because I was in combat

Quote.Author: George H. W. Bush
Quote.QuoteValue: Gulf Lesson One is the value of airpower

Quote.Author: George Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: All the world is birthday cake, so take a piece, but not too much

Quote.Author: George Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: When you've seen beyond yourself, then you may find, peace of mind is waiting there

Quote.Author: George Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: With our love, we could save the world

Quote.Author: George Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: The Beatles will exist without us

Quote.Author: George Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: As far as I'm concerned, there won't be a Beatles reunion as long as John Lennon remains dead

Quote.Author: George Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: As long as you hate, there will be people to hate

Quote.Author: George Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: You've got as many lives as you like, and more, even ones you don't want

Quote.Author: George Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: It is better to be an outspoken atheist than a hypocrite

Quote.Author: George Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything else can wait, but the search for God cannot wait

Quote.Author: George Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: I just got so fed up with the bad vibes. I didn't care if it was the Beatles; I was getting out

Quote.Author: George Henry Lewes
Quote.QuoteValue: Originality is independence, not rebellion; it is sincerity, not antagonism

Quote.Author: George Henry Lewes
Quote.QuoteValue: Insincerity is always weakness; sincerity even in error is strength

Quote.Author: George Henry Lewes
Quote.QuoteValue: The only cure for grief is action

Quote.Author: George Henry Lewes
Quote.QuoteValue: We must never assume that which is incapable of proof

Quote.Author: George Henry Lewes
Quote.QuoteValue: Murder, like talent, seems occasionally to run in families

Quote.Author: George Henry Lewes
Quote.QuoteValue: Science is the systematic classification of experience

Quote.Author: George Henry Lewes
Quote.QuoteValue: The object of Literature is to instruct, to animate, or to amuse

Quote.Author: George Henry Lewes
Quote.QuoteValue: Good writers are of necessity rare

Quote.Author: George Henry Lewes
Quote.QuoteValue: Sincerity is moral truth

Quote.Author: George Henry Lewes
Quote.QuoteValue: Literature delivers tidings of the world within and the world without

Quote.Author: George Herbert
Quote.QuoteValue: Prayer should be the key of the day and the lock of the night

Quote.Author: George Herbert
Quote.QuoteValue: One father is more than a hundred schoolmasters

Quote.Author: George Herbert
Quote.QuoteValue: Storms make the oak grow deeper roots

Quote.Author: George Herbert
Quote.QuoteValue: Living well is the best revenge

Quote.Author: George Herbert
Quote.QuoteValue: If a donkey bray at you, don't bray at him

Quote.Author: George Herbert
Quote.QuoteValue: Be thrifty, but not covetous

Quote.Author: George Herbert
Quote.QuoteValue: Read as you taste fruit or savor wine, or enjoy friendship, love or life

Quote.Author: George Herbert
Quote.QuoteValue: Good words are worth much, and cost little

Quote.Author: George Herbert
Quote.QuoteValue: War makes thieves and peace hangs them

Quote.Author: George Herbert
Quote.QuoteValue: Skill and confidence are an unconquered army

Quote.Author: George Jean Nathan
Quote.QuoteValue: The path of sound credence is through the thick forest of skepticism

Quote.Author: George Jean Nathan
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is the emotion that a woman feels always for a poodle dog and sometimes for a man

Quote.Author: George Jean Nathan
Quote.QuoteValue: An optimist is a fellow who believes a housefly is looking for a way to get out

Quote.Author: George Jean Nathan
Quote.QuoteValue: Love demands infinitely less than friendship

Quote.Author: George Jean Nathan
Quote.QuoteValue: Bad officials are the ones elected by good citizens who do not vote

Quote.Author: George Jean Nathan
Quote.QuoteValue: I drink to make other people interesting

Quote.Author: George Jean Nathan
Quote.QuoteValue: No man can think clearly when his fists are clenched

Quote.Author: George Jean Nathan
Quote.QuoteValue: Patriotism is often an arbitrary veneration of real estate above principles

Quote.Author: George Jean Nathan
Quote.QuoteValue: Great art is as irrational as great music. It is mad with its own loveliness

Quote.Author: George Jean Nathan
Quote.QuoteValue: What passes for woman's intuition is often nothing more than man's transparency

Quote.Author: George Lois
Quote.QuoteValue: What Apple did for technology is brilliant, but they didn't do nothin' for our economy

Quote.Author: George Lois
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no such thing as a cautious creative

Quote.Author: George Lois
Quote.QuoteValue: I've done truth to power all my life. It's got me into trouble, but who cares?

Quote.Author: George Lois
Quote.QuoteValue: If you work with convictions, people have got to listen to you

Quote.Author: George Lois
Quote.QuoteValue: When you create advertising, always start with the words

Quote.Author: George Lois
Quote.QuoteValue: The whole area of creativity is constipated and frightened

Quote.Author: George Lois
Quote.QuoteValue: Great advertising, in and of itself, becomes a benefit of the product

Quote.Author: George Lois
Quote.QuoteValue: A truly great magazine cover surprises, even shocks, and connects in a nano-second

Quote.Author: George Lois
Quote.QuoteValue: If you think people are dumb, you'll spend a lifetime doing dumb work

Quote.Author: George Lois
Quote.QuoteValue: I look in the mirror, and I work with the brightest person I know

Quote.Author: George Lucas
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't do it unless you can imagine it

Quote.Author: George Lucas
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever has happened in my quest for innovation has been part of my quest for immaculate reality

Quote.Author: George Lucas
Quote.QuoteValue: Working hard is very important. You're not going to get anywhere without working extremely hard

Quote.Author: George Lucas
Quote.QuoteValue: Good luck has its storms

Quote.Author: George Lucas
Quote.QuoteValue: Storytelling is about two things; it's about character and plot

Quote.Author: George Lucas
Quote.QuoteValue: I live a reasonably simple life, off the beaten track

Quote.Author: George Lucas
Quote.QuoteValue: The secret to film is that it's an illusion

Quote.Author: George Lucas
Quote.QuoteValue: I thought Star Wars was too wacky for the general public

Quote.Author: George Lucas
Quote.QuoteValue: Learning to make films is very easy. Learning what to make films about is very hard

Quote.Author: George Lucas
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody has talent, it's just a matter of moving around until you've discovered what it is

Quote.Author: George M. Church
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't just hoard your ideas inside the ivory tower. You have to get them out into the world

Quote.Author: George M. Church
Quote.QuoteValue: People think it's great to be ahead of your time, but it can actually be quite painful

Quote.Author: George M. Church
Quote.QuoteValue: I always loved computers - it's something inside you

Quote.Author: George M. Church
Quote.QuoteValue: We might want to figure out what are the positive effects of autism - mild cases

Quote.Author: George M. Church
Quote.QuoteValue: Making new petroleum should be as simple and straightforward as brewing beer

Quote.Author: George M. Church
Quote.QuoteValue: The best way to predict the future is to change it

Quote.Author: George M. Church
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't actually believe there's any such thing as privacy

Quote.Author: George M. Church
Quote.QuoteValue: Your genetics is not your destiny

Quote.Author: George M. Church
Quote.QuoteValue: Trees are essentially growing chairs. There are lots of primates that sit and sleep in them

Quote.Author: George M. Church
Quote.QuoteValue: Reversal of ageing is high on my list of things to do, and not just because I'm getting old

Quote.Author: George MacDonald
Quote.QuoteValue: To be trusted is a greater compliment than being loved

Quote.Author: George MacDonald
Quote.QuoteValue: How strange this fear of death is! We are never frightened at a sunset

Quote.Author: George MacDonald
Quote.QuoteValue: We die daily. Happy those who daily come to life as well

Quote.Author: George MacDonald
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not the cares of today, but the cares of tomorrow, that weigh a man down

Quote.Author: George MacDonald
Quote.QuoteValue: To keep a lamp burning we have to keep putting oil in it

Quote.Author: George MacDonald
Quote.QuoteValue: Attitudes are more important than facts

Quote.Author: George MacDonald
Quote.QuoteValue: Forgiveness is the giving, and so the receiving, of life

Quote.Author: George MacDonald
Quote.QuoteValue: Anything large enough for a wish to light upon, is large enough to hang a prayer upon

Quote.Author: George MacDonald
Quote.QuoteValue: Few delights can equal the presence of one whom we trust utterly

Quote.Author: George MacDonald
Quote.QuoteValue: To have what we want is riches; but to be able to do without is power

Quote.Author: George McGovern
Quote.QuoteValue: Empathy is born out of the old biblical injunction 'Love the neighbor as thyself.'

Quote.Author: George McGovern
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm fed up to the ears with old men dreaming up wars for young men to die in

Quote.Author: George McGovern
Quote.QuoteValue: The longer the title, the less important the job

Quote.Author: George McGovern
Quote.QuoteValue: I am 1,000 percent for Tom Eagleton and I have no intention of dropping him from the ticket

Quote.Author: George McGovern
Quote.QuoteValue: The whole campaign was a tragic case of mistaken identity

Quote.Author: George McGovern
Quote.QuoteValue: I am fed up with a system which busts the pot smoker and lets the big dope racketeer go free

Quote.Author: George McGovern
Quote.QuoteValue: I always thought of myself as a good old South Dakota boy who grew up here on the prairie

Quote.Author: George McGovern
Quote.QuoteValue: It really is true that an orator is simply a good man who speaks well

Quote.Author: George McGovern
Quote.QuoteValue: I met my wife in South Dakota

Quote.Author: George McGovern
Quote.QuoteValue: Now, I simply do what I want

Quote.Author: George Meredith
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't just count your years, make your years count

Quote.Author: George Meredith
Quote.QuoteValue: Who rises from prayer a better man, his prayer is answered

Quote.Author: George Meredith
Quote.QuoteValue: I expect Woman will be the last thing civilized by Man

Quote.Author: George Meredith
Quote.QuoteValue: She poured a little social sewage into his ears

Quote.Author: George Meredith
Quote.QuoteValue: Caricature is rough truth

Quote.Author: George Meredith
Quote.QuoteValue: Memoirs are the backstairs of history

Quote.Author: George Meredith
Quote.QuoteValue: Cynicism is intellectual dandyism

Quote.Author: George Meredith
Quote.QuoteValue: Possession without obligation to the object possessed approaches felicity

Quote.Author: George Meredith
Quote.QuoteValue: Kissing don't last: cookery do!

Quote.Author: George Meredith
Quote.QuoteValue: Jealousy is love bed of burning snarl

Quote.Author: George Michael
Quote.QuoteValue: You'll never find peace of mind until you listen to your heart

Quote.Author: George Michael
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the media is a real demon

Quote.Author: George Michael
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no comfort in the truth, pain is all you'll find

Quote.Author: George Michael
Quote.QuoteValue: I have never felt any ethnic connection between the Greeks and me other than how hairy I am

Quote.Author: George Michael
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't consider Americans bullies, but I do consider the American government bullying

Quote.Author: George Michael
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm surprised that I've survived my own dysfunction, really

Quote.Author: George Michael
Quote.QuoteValue: Celebrity and secrets don't go together. The bastards will get you in the end

Quote.Author: George Michael
Quote.QuoteValue: I define my sexuality in terms of the people that I love

Quote.Author: George Michael
Quote.QuoteValue: It's almost required with major artists that there's some duality. And I've got duality everywhere

Quote.Author: George Michael
Quote.QuoteValue: The truth is my love life has been a lot more turbulent than I have let on

Quote.Author: George Osborne
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't come from a traditional Tory background; it was urban and metropolitan

Quote.Author: George Osborne
Quote.QuoteValue: I would say I have taken substantive action to make things easier for people

Quote.Author: George Osborne
Quote.QuoteValue: I think you can look at the British economy with confidence

Quote.Author: George Osborne
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to see genuine talent rewarded

Quote.Author: George Osborne
Quote.QuoteValue: Believe me, I understand that most higher rate taxpayers are not the super-rich

Quote.Author: George Osborne
Quote.QuoteValue: Britain has no divine right to be one of the richest countries in the world

Quote.Author: George Osborne
Quote.QuoteValue: The rise in world oil prices has been larger than anyone forecast

Quote.Author: George Osborne
Quote.QuoteValue: Some things never change, suck up to the government and you get an honour

Quote.Author: George Osborne
Quote.QuoteValue: Most successful politicians don't let the job swamp their lives

Quote.Author: George Osborne
Quote.QuoteValue: Autism is a very serious condition

Quote.Author: George Packer
Quote.QuoteValue: Pay attention to other people's nightmares because they might be contagious

Quote.Author: George Packer
Quote.QuoteValue: It seems preposterous now, but Amazon began as a bookstore

Quote.Author: George Packer
Quote.QuoteValue: America's vast population of working poor can only get so poor before even Walmart is out of reach

Quote.Author: George Packer
Quote.QuoteValue: Millions don't rally to the banner of Uncertainty

Quote.Author: George Packer
Quote.QuoteValue: A great writer requires a great biography, and a great biography must tell the truth

Quote.Author: George Packer
Quote.QuoteValue: Politics demands certain skills honed by experience, just as journalism does, just as acting does

Quote.Author: George Packer
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything seems set up for success in digital journalism - money, eyeballs, software, brands

Quote.Author: George Packer
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a cliche that the Senate is broken, and like most cliches, it's true

Quote.Author: George Packer
Quote.QuoteValue: How a candidate runs shapes how a president governs

Quote.Author: George Packer
Quote.QuoteValue: Mark Zuckerberg has started an advocacy group for immigration reform

Quote.Author: George R. R. Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody is a villain in their own story. We're all the heroes of our own stories

Quote.Author: George R. R. Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: I prefer to work with grey characters rather than black and white

Quote.Author: George R. R. Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: All fiction has to have a certain amount of truth in it to be powerful
